title: Rose Quartz Chandbali Stud Earrings with Uncut Diamonds
materials: Uncut Diamonds (Polki Diamonds - పోల్కి వజ్రాలు). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: These exquisite Chandbali studs feature a classic circular design. A central pear-shaped Rose Quartz gemstone is surrounded by delicately placed uncut diamonds (Polki). Intricate gold filigree work forms a delicate frame around the quartz and diamonds, adding to the vintage charm.
colors: Uncut Diamonds (white/off-white). The soft pink of the Rose Quartz complements the warm gold and the sparkle of the uncut diamonds
creating a harmonious and elegant color palette.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional occasions like Seemantham (సీమంతం)
Half-Saree Function ( లంగా వోని ఫంక్షన్) or Diwali
description: These earrings are a testament to the timeless elegance of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The unique combination of Rose Quartz and uncut diamonds, set in high-quality gold, makes them a rare and valuable piece. Their versatility allows them to be worn with both traditional and modern outfits, making them a worthwhile investment.
